avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow added in rather calm wind. Older snow considered stable. Changing weather with alternating snow showers and thaw and rain showers the next days. Minor movements cannot be ruled out.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow added in rather calm wind, but poor bonding is with in the snow. Older snow considered stable. Changing weather with alternating snow showers and thaw and rain showers the next days. Minor movements cannot be ruled out.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wet sluffs could release as temperatures rise.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wet sluffs could release as temperatures rise.

weatherForecast.highlights: Umhleypingarsamt veður næstu daga, frost og él eða hlýindi og rigning/skúrir til skiptis.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Thinn wind slabs may be expected in southerly aspects. Southerly wind and snow showers the next days and unstable winds slabs may form in mountains.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow was added in N-NE snow showers on Sunday and Monday. Unstable thinn wind slabs may be expected in southerly aspects. Older snow is homogeneous and grainy. Southerly wind and snow showers expected the next days and unstable winds slabs may form in mountains.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wet sluffs could release as temperatures rise.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wet sluffs could release as temperatures rise.

weatherForecast.highlights: Bætir í vind og ofankomu fimmtudags kvöld. Gengur á með éljum til fjalla á föstudag en slydda eða rigning á láglendi. Suðlæg átt og gengur á með éljum um helgina.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Wet sluffs could release on Friday. Recent snow is in the area and wind slabs could be present.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Rising temperature on Friday and small wet sluffs could release. Recent snow is in the area and small wind slabs could be present on most aspects. A snowpit from Siglufjörður on Feb 26th showed a slab on top of the old snow. A compression test showed a sudden collapse at medium load on the boundary between the old and new snow.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wet sluffs could release as temperatures rise.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wet sluffs could release as temperatures rise.

weatherForecast.highlights: Breytilegar áttir næstu daga og umhleypingar. Úrkoma með köflum.

avalancheActivity.comment: Small sluff released in Magnúsartindur in Oddsskarð on Feb 26th. Multiple thin avalanches released in Seldalur and Fannardalur in Norðfjörður on Saturday morning, Feb 22nd.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Wet sluffs could release on Friday. Recent snow is at high elevations and small slabs could be present.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Rising temperature and rain on Friday may cause wet sluffs. It has snowed a bit in the last few days. There is little snow in the lower parts of slopes but at high elevations small slabs could be present.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wet sluffs could release as temperatures rise.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wet sluffs could release as temperatures rise.

weatherForecast.highlights: Umhleypingasamt veður næstu daga þar sem skiptast á S-áttir með rigningu og kaldar SV-áttir með líkur á éljum.
